722270.name: Lantern of Worlds - The Story of King Valdemar
722270.description:
The story of king Valdemar is an 11 page PDF booklet, that tells the story of how king Valdemar rose to the throne of Idunia. Learn of his battles, his victories, and his losses, as he becomes the ruler and protector of Iduna, and the leader of the Royal Adventurers!

The story is the first of many, that will accompany each new game in the Lantern of Worlds series, and will shed light on the histories of the mayor characters the player will meet.

The PDF is available from your SteamApps\Lantern of Worlds game directory.
